Home.subTitle: Online Exams Made Super Easy!
Home.brief: Explore a great learning and assessment experience

About.title: All-In-One Assessment Platform for Teachers and Schools

features.detail: ClassTech provides an effective and reliable online assessment with instant grading.

ClassTech is designed with built-in anti-cheating settings, such as: randomization of questions, randomization of MCQ options, no backward navigation to previous questions and an allocated timer to answer each question.
ClassTech cuts the cost and paper wastage incurred during the examination process.
ClassTech is developed in two versions: For Teachers and for Schools.
Headmasters have dashboards to monitor examination processes in all classes across different subjects.
ClassTech facilitates seamless communication between school administration, teachers, students and their parents.
ClassTech analytics provide insights to support decision of school administration with respect to students’ learning progress and teachers’ performance.
ClassTech is a web-based solution that can be used to plan and reports exams in-campus and off-campus.
Parents may have instant access to view grades of their children in each exam.
ClassTech empowers teachers to develop a secure bank of questions, with labels related to: subject, topic, duration and assigned marks to each question.
Teachers can easily plan, save and launch exams at any given time and date to assigned classes. Then teachers can decide when to share exam results with classes or individual students.
ClassTech reports the learning progress of students and even indicate topics (within the subject) in which more effort is required to guide teaching plans, where ea‘assessment drives learning’.

features.title: Add Class
features.brief: Create a class with any label that suits any feature of your students , grade , timing or simply Brilliant

features.title: Add Students
features.brief: Add students to your classes to assign exams to all at once and view their class-based reports.

features.title: Author Questions
features.brief: Start building your item (question) bank in either MCQ, Short Answer or T/F to be used for future exams.

features.title: Adjust Grade/Questions
features.brief: You can adjust the marks and duration allocated to each question in your personal bank.

features.title: Plan & Launch Exams
features.brief: Search your item bank to plan exams and launch them to assigned classes.

features.title: Generate Reports
features.brief: Generate reports per student or per class and decide when to share results with them.

features.title: Elegant Design
features.brief: Designers applied the best practices in UX (User Experience) and UI (User Interface)

features.title: Top-Notch Technology
features.brief: The module was developed using Python which enables analytics using AI (artificial intelligence)

features.title: Secured Question Bank
features.brief: All your questions and results are secured in a cloud and can be restored, if lost.
